body.name: Diono Everett NXT High Back Booster Car Seat with Rigid Latch, Lightweight Slim Fit Design, 8 Years 1 Booster Seat, Red
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 22 mins
features: 8 Years One Booster - for your big kid from 40 - 120 lb. It's all you will ever need.
Easy-adjust - 7-position headrest that grows up with your child. Engineered for safety and comfort with 2 layers of Side Impact Protection.
Built for comfort for every size - our backrest has deep padded cushioning.
Our contoured premium soft fabrics - with layered foam padding that provide comfort and support can be easily removed for machine washing.
Open loop belt guides - easy access to seatbelt buckle help your big kid with self buckling - don't forget to check though!
body.description: Designed to grow and built to last, when it comes to your next adventure, Everett NXT booster seat is always ready. Slim-fit, super lightweight and equipped with easy click rigid LATCH connectors for safe and secure installation every time. Suitable from 40 - 120 lb, expect 8 years of safety from just one booster seat. Awarded IIHS Best Bet Booster Seat, Everett NXT high back booster features easy click rigid LATCH connectors for a quick and simple way to secure the booster car seat using your vehicle latch system. This not only enhances safety and stability but also allows parents to switch between vehicles with ease. Lovingly engineered to accommodate children as they grow, this booster provides uncompromising safety, comfort, and support with reinforced 7 position headrest, that can be easily adjusted with one hand for added protection up to 63 in tall. Designed with slim-fit, narrow frame without compromising child or passenger comfort and weighing only 11.1 lb Everett NXT makes the perfect addition to busy back seats.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Diono Engineering Lightweight (11.1 lb) and Narrow-Fit Design yet provides Solid Support, with Extra Padded Headrest with 7 Adjustable Positions, Side Impact Protection, Ergonomic Design, plus Rigid LATCH Connectors for secure installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits wonderfully in my Dodge Challenger
reviews.reviewText: I was on a search for a compact and easy to install booster for my toddler. Having a coupe, it was very important for me to be able to install and un-install the booster with ease having little to no room to maneuver in the back seat. THIS BOOSTER meets all my boxes. Light weight, easy to install, stylish, comfortable for my toddler, and sturdy.The easy latch system on this booster is hands down the best feature for the booster in my opinion. I can pop this seat in and out QUICK and easy with no guess work if it's in right or not!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely well built and had adjustable back
reviews.reviewText: Love this it is the 4th one we have bought so we do not have to swap between vehicles so much. Granddaughter says it's comfortable and the surfaces are easily cleaned. Thr back piece can adjust reaward some. The bottom comes off which is nice for traveling if you decide to out it under the plane for any reason.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love everything about this booster seat!
reviews.reviewText: Highlights include easy, tight install with rigid LATCH, lightweight but solid and sturdy, full coverage fabric, narrow enough to fit three across, smooth bottom that doesn’t dent leather upholstery, very easy to access seatbelt buckle, grandson says it looks cool and it’s comfortable. He’s four years old and 40 pounds for reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but slim and good quality/fit
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is as it says slim profile.I have a bmw i4 which I was struggling with other booster seats bc the seatbelt buckle portion is hard to get to under the other boosters.This one fits the car seat in easily with its direct latches and leaves enough space to easily get to the seat belt receptor in my bmw.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love love love the diono brand car seats! I have now upgraded all my children to the brand! Got this one for my 4 year old and he loves it! These car seats are so easy to install and uninstall and they are very comfy compared to other brands! The safety ratings are awesome to which is super important and one of my deciding factors when I decided to switch over to this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: Didn’t give 5 stars because it doesn’t come with cup holders which my granddaughter pointed out immediately! Love the color and the style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly in a Prius
reviews.reviewText: I've struggled to find a booster that is narrow enough of the rear of the base to allow my daughter to easily buckle herself. Every booster I've tried in my Prius before this one would be basically on top of the buckle. This completely solved our issues 🙏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my granddaughter
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for when my little granddaughter visits. It nice and lite and easy to put in my SUV and take out. It also comes in two pieces so i can store it easy and adapt it as she grows.

reviews.reviewTitle: Your little ones will be always comfortable and protected with the Diono quality
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Diono product and I came back for more due to how satisfied I was with my first car seat. Which, BTW, is being transferred to the younger one since I bought this to my 5 year old. The first thing she said when she sat on this booster was "Uh, so comfy" and the problem was to remove her off the seat once we got to our destination. It was extremely easy to install and to have the seatbelt in place when we're ready to go. I highly recommend this brand and product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfy my kids love it
reviews.reviewText: Roomy, safe and comfy. My kids love their seats !
